site.name: Artesanos Café
site.description: Passionate about coffee, cravings, and great moments. Coffee is what gathers us and keeps us moving.
site.address: Dr Emilio Hassler y San Roque González de Santa Cruz, Asunción, Paraguay

hero.title: Artesanos Café
hero.subtitle: Coffee is what brings us together
hero.text: A place to share: coffee, cravings, and good moments. Come enjoy an artisan-flavored ritual.

list.title: Coffee with identity
list.text: Consistent drinks, flavor and texture you can taste in every cup.

list.title: Cravings & classics
list.text: Sweet and savory options to pair with your coffee, from morning to afternoon.

list.title: Community & moments
list.text: A spot made for meeting, talking, and coming back.

visit.title: Visit us
visit.text: Dr Emilio Hassler y San Roque González de Santa Cruz,, Asunción. We’ll be waiting with coffee and a great moment.

products.name: Mbejú
products.short: A Paraguayan classic, crispy and cheesy.
products.long: Perfect for breakfast or afternoon treats: simple, well-made, always worth it.

products.name: Homemade cake
products.long: Flavors rotate daily, ask what’s available today.

aboutPage.title: Our Story
aboutPage.subtitle: Made with care, meant to be shared

paragraphs: Artesanos was born from a simple idea: creating a place where coffee is the meeting point.
We’re community, flavor, and consistency, aiming for every cup to keep its quality, here and anywhere.

team.name: Artesanos Team
team.bio: We take care of the details so you always come back for what feels good.

items.author: Verified customer
items.text: Great coffee and the perfect place to catch up. Would definitely return.

items.author: Verified customer
items.text: Excellent pairings to go with coffee. Very warm service.

items.author: Verified customer
items.text: Good vibe and well-made coffee. Ideal with friends.

seo.title: Coffee in Asunción | Artesanos Café
seo.description: Artesanos Café: coffee, cravings, and great moments in Asunción. Visit us at Dr Emilio Hassler y San Roque González de Santa Cruz.
